reviews.review: Loved this movie.  So good.  So much going on and yet very simple to follow.  Action was amazing.  I was worried about Thanos being too CGI but he was amazing also.  I will definitely see this movie again.
Intense, funny, heartbreaking; amazing scenes non stop anxiety. Enjoy the ride
Absolutely amazing movie which drops your jaw and makes you feel very sad. Marvel has made a masterpiece.

Avengers: Infinity War was a disappointment. After waiting to experience my superheros in the battle of their lives, I am left feeling empty and actually wanting to not include the movie in my collection. Not happy at all with the results or the message which can be taken to mean eradication of the certain human races. I will not be seeing this again.

I thought the film was better than what I expected it to be after the ten year buildup. Thanos is a very detailed and strong villain. The cast works so well together and every scene is definitely worth the hype in terms of epicness. Everything that happened in the film was shocking and worked effectively. The ending is also unique compared to other MCU films, we'll see how part 2 goes.

Almost perfect. Infinity war is the start to a brave ending to this saga. With a genius cast and combination of brutality and light hearted comedy this film sets up what will inevitably be the most anticipated film of the decade only contested by the new episodes of the star wars saga. Those people who criticise it simply have not understood the 18 films and 10 year period that has built up to the release of infinity war. Thanos is set to become our generations Vader. Brilliant.

Take notes Lucasfilm, this is how you make a major tentpole film for your franchise.
A true equal for Empire Strikes Back
Loses half a point for not having an ending, but everything else was ambitious and outstanding.
The must-see movie for marvel fans and the uninitiated alike. Equally funny and sad, this action blockbuster is pure quality and one of the best from Marvel studios.
